content: Raccoon River within Des Moines Water Works Park in central Iowa. The river starts in NW Iowa and is named as one of America’s Most Endangered Rivers of 2021 due to unmitigated pollution from factory farms within the watershed. Drought and climate change exacerbate the problem for those who depend on the river for drinking water__no.0780, 2021. 781.  Platte River at Platte Lake, east of Lake Michigan on Michigan’s lower peninsula__no.0781, 2021.
